title: Register a new company
lead: Enter the Company ID (IČO), review the details, and create the owner (OWNER) account.

0.title: Step 1 — Company ID (IČO)
0.desc: Enter the company ID. In the next step you can review and adjust the details.

1.title: Step 2 — Company
1.desc: Review and adjust the company name, VAT ID, legal form, and address.

2.title: Step 3 — Owner & Consents
2.desc: Fill in the owner details and confirm the consents.

3.title: Done!
3.desc: Registration succeeded. You can log in or register another company.
